code: @Override public void afterConfigurerAdded(ConfigurableMockMvcBuilder<?> builder) {     builder.alwaysDo(result -> this.session = result.getRequest().getSession(false)). }

@Override public RequestPostProcessor beforeMockMvcCreated(ConfigurableMockMvcBuilder<?> builder, WebApplicationContext context) {     return request -> {         if (this.session != null) {             request.setSession(this.session).         }         return request.     }. }
public static SharedHttpSessionConfigurer sharedHttpSession() {     return new SharedHttpSessionConfigurer(). }
